title: Krohn (Dr. Roland E.S.)
body:
(Dr. Roland E.S.)
 English doctor, but from a family of Russian origin, who practiced medicine in Madeira for several years. He published *Die Hygiene auf Funchal in Madeira* (Archiv für Schiffs und Tropen-Hygiene, vol. III, 1899) and *Führer durch Madeira*, Berlin, 1906, 1 vol.

He died in a sanatorium in Switzerland, succumbing to pulmonary tuberculosis, around the year 1908.

1899: Publication of the book *Die Hygiene auf Funchal in Madeira* by Dr. Roland E.S. Krohn
1906: Publication of the book *Führer durch Madeira* by Dr. Roland E.S. Krohn
1908: Death of Dr. Roland E.S. Krohn
